jobs.title: LLM Applied Data Scientist (RAG/ NLP)
jobs.description:
Binance is a leading global blockchain ecosystem behind the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume and registered users. We are trusted by over 280 million people in 100+ countries for our industry-leading security, user fund transparency, trading engine speed, deep liquidity, and an unmatched portfolio of digital-asset products. Binance offerings range from trading and finance to education, research, payments, institutional services, Web3 features, and more. We leverage the power of digital assets and blockchain to build an inclusive financial ecosystem to advance the freedom of money and improve financial access for people around the world.



About the Role
We are seeking a highly skilled Research Scientist/Engineer to advance the reasoning and planning capabilities of large foundation models. In this role, you will enhance model performance across the entire development lifecycle—including data acquisition, supervised fine-tuning (SFT), reward modelling, and reinforcement learning—while driving innovations in reasoning and decision-making. You will synthesise large-scale, high-quality datasets through rewriting, augmentation, and generation techniques to strengthen foundation models during pretraining, SFT, and RL stages. A key part of the role involves solving complex tasks using System 2 thinking and applying advanced decoding strategies such as MCTS and A*. You will design and implement robust evaluation methodologies, teach models to interact with external tools, APIs, and code interpreters, and build agents and multi-agent systems capable of addressing sophisticated real-world problems.

jobs.title: Content Editor & Proofreader
jobs.description:
About the Role:

We’re looking for a sharp-eyed and thoughtful Content Editor & Proofreader to elevate the quality of all written materials across our company. This hybrid role goes beyond grammar, it’s about ensuring every piece of content is clear, consistent, on-brand, and error-free.

As a core member of our Global Brand Studio, you’ll play a pivotal role in influencing the trajectory of one of the world’s most prominent and rapidly expanding brands.

jobs.title: Senior Director, Physical Security
jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>The&nbsp;<strong>Senior Director, Physical Security</strong> will lead the global physical security strategy for Coinbase—encompassing corporate offices, data centers and employee protection. As a strategic leader reporting into the Chief Security Officer (CSO), you’ll build and manage a physical security team, architect layered controls, and ensure continuity across our global footprint.</p> <p>You'll work closely with cross-functional teams—engineering, legal/regulatory, physical properties, and executive leadership—to deliver comprehensive, risk-based security programs.</p> <p><strong>What you’ll be doing (ie. job duties):</strong></p> <ul> <li>Craft and execute a global physical security strategy aligned with enterprise risk and business priorities.</li> <li>Responsible for the physical security operations across the entirety of Coinbase’s expanding global office footprint (including data centers) as well as executive residences.</li> <li>Lead the design, deployment, and continuous improvement of access control, surveillance, perimeter protection, and emergency response programs.</li> <li>Manage vendor performance (security systems integrators, guards, monitors, investigations).</li> <li>Establish physical security standards and protocols—integrated with cyber and information security programs.</li> <li>Leverage&nbsp; risk assessments to make informed, risk-based recommendations to programs; ensure compliance with local regulations and insurance requirements.</li> <li>Drive business continuity and crisis management planning for on-site incidents and broad contingencies.</li> <li>Hire, mentor, and lead a geographically distributed physical security team.</li> <li>Navigate security due diligence for real estate and M&amp;A transactions, and support executive protection planning.</li> <li>Manage physical security budgets and measure program effectiveness through KPIs, dashboards, and risk reporting.</li> <li>Fully manage and direct multiple Physical Security sub-teams and their workstreams, including Security Systems, Executive Protection, Security Operations, Environmental Health &amp; Safety, and Protective Intelligence.</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you (ie. job requirements):</strong></p> <p><strong>Must-haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>12+ years in corporate or enterprise-level physical security, with 5+ years in leadership roles (director-level or above).</li> <li>Experience leading a large team (20+ employees) across a wide range of skillsets, backgrounds, and personality types.</li> <li>Experience scaling global security programs: offices, data centers.</li> <li>Expertise in physical access systems, executive protection, surveillance design, investigations, and vendor oversight.</li> <li>Strong risk-management background: assessments, business continuity, and emergency response.</li> <li>Proven leadership: team building, mentoring, and cross-functional influence.</li> <li>Excellent written and verbal communication—able to align security strategy with executive teams.</li> <li>Willingness to travel 20-30% across major global facilities.<br>&

jobs.title: Senior Finance & Strategy Analyst, FP&A
jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>The FP&amp;A team is at the heart of Coinbase's strategic execution, translating our ambitious mission to unlock economic freedom into a sustainable financial reality. We ensure the company's resources are deployed effectively, providing the data-driven guidance that fuels our growth and powers the future of finance. We own the company’s financial roadmap, from the annual operating plan and rolling forecasts to the in-depth business reviews that ensure we drive efficiency and make informed trade offs</p> <p>Are you fascinated by the story behind the numbers and driven to uncover the 'why' behind the data? Do you thrive in a detail-oriented environment and enjoy taking ownership of your work to achieve shared goals? We are seeking a Senior Financial Analyst to be a critical member of the FP&amp;A team supporting our Legal and Compliance organization.</p> <p>In this role, you will be a key financial partner to our Legal and Compliance&nbsp; teams, taking ownership of the analysis that guides their operational expenditure (OpEx) planning. Your work will directly contribute to resource allocation, efficiency, and sound strategic decisions as we scale. If you are a proactive, detail-oriented analyst who is eager to make an impact and grow your career, we want to talk to you.</p> <p>What You’ll Be Doing:</p> <ul> <li>Manage end-to-end financial deliverables: Take ownership of the forecasting, reporting, and analysis for your business partners within the Legal and Compliance organization, ensuring deadlines and deliverables for the annual budget and monthly planning are met with precision.</li> <li>Uncover Actionable Insights: Proactively dive into financial and operational data to identify trends, anomalies, and opportunities. We're looking for someone who won’t wait to be asked, but who actively seeks out the "why" behind the numbers.</li> <li>Serve as a Key Financial Partner: Build strong working relationships with partners in the Legal and Compliance organizations. Prepare and present your analysis during business reviews, translating complex data into clear recommendations.</li> <li>Ensure Financial Accuracy: Own the month-end close process for your areas, conducting detailed variance analysis and working with the Accounting team to maintain the absolute integrity of our financial data.</li> <li>Build and Own Financial Models: Develop, maintain, and own the financial models that drive analysis into financial risks and opportunities.</li> </ul> <p>What We Look For In You:</p> <ul> <li>A Passion for Financial Analysis: You have a genuine interest in operational efficiency and a drive to use data to understand and influence business performance.</li> <li>Proactive and Curious Mindset: You are a self-starter with a strong work ethic, who is not afraid to dig deep into data and ask challenging questions.</li> <li>Meticulous Attention to Detail: You are highly organized, committed to accuracy, and take pride in delivering precise and reliable work you can stand behind.</li> <li>Strong Collaborative Skills: You are an excellent teammate who can build positive relationships and communicate effectively with partners across the organization.</li> <li>Analytical Foundation: 4-8+ years of relevant experience

As a Digital Designer, you will play a crucial role in developing engaging and visually appealing digital creative content across various platforms. The ideal candidate possesses a keen eye for design aesthetics, stays abreast of digital trends, and is adept at translating ideas into compelling visuals. This position requires experience in AI tools and offers the flexibility of remote work, allowing you to collaborate effectively from anywhere.

jobs.title: Senior Manager, CX Consumer Analytics
jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>At Coinbase, we are building a world-class Customer Experience (CX) organization that supports millions of users globally--across Consumer and Compliance operations. We’re seeking a data-driven, operationally minded Senior Manager, CX Consumer Analytics to lead a team of analytics engineers in service of our Consumer CX operations, including Core, Social, and Specialty Operations support.</p> <p>This leader will be responsible for delivering the insights, data infrastructure, and reporting that enable our operations teams to make faster, smarter decisions at scale. You will partner closely with CX leadership, Vendor Management, Product, and Enterprise Data teams to ensure our analytics capabilities anticipate and meet the evolving needs of our customers. The ideal candidate combines deep experience in analytics engineering with strong stakeholder management skills, an operational mindset, and a bias toward actionable outcomes in a high-growth, regulated environment.</p> <p><strong>What you’ll be doing</strong></p> <p><strong>CX Consumer analytics strategy</strong></p> <ul> <li>Define and execute a cohesive analytics roadmap that addresses the priorities of Core, Social, and Specialty Consumer CX operations.</li> <li>Lead a team of analytics engineers and analytics managers to develop and maintain high-quality dashboards, reporting, and automation.</li> <li>Ensure all analytics solutions are scalable, well-documented, and aligned with enterprise data architecture.</li> <li>Partner with Enterprise Data Engineering and Data Science to enhance data pipelines and integrate new data sources.</li> <li>Establish and enforce best practices for data accuracy, governance, and accessibility.</li> </ul> <p><strong>Operational impact</strong></p> <ul> <li>Translate operational challenges into analytical deliverables that improve agent productivity, customer experience, and operational efficiency.</li> <li>Develop metrics frameworks and performance measurement systems that enable proactive decision-making.</li> <li>Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure data insights are embedded into business processes.</li> </ul> <p><strong>Leadership and development</strong></p> <ul> <li>Manage, mentor, and develop a high-performing team of analytics engineers.</li> <li>Foster a culture of curiosity, accountability, and continuous improvement.</li> <li>Act as a trusted advisor to CX leaders by identifying risks, opportunities, and strategic insights.</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you</strong></p> <ul> <li>7+ years of experience in analytics, analytics engineering, or business intelligence roles, with at least 3+ years managing teams.</li> <li>Strong command of SQL and experience with modern BI tools (Looker, Tableau, Mode, etc.); experience with Python or R a plus.</li> <li>Proven ability to build scalable data models, pipelines, and dashboards that drive measurable operational impact.</li> <li>Experience partnering with operations leaders to define requirements and translate them into data solutions.</li> <li>Familiarity with data governance, quality jobs.title: Marketing Manager - Peru
jobs.description:
Binance is a leading global blockchain ecosystem behind the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume and registered users. We are trusted by over 280 million people in 100+ countries for our industry-leading security, user fund transparency, trading engine speed, deep liquidity, and an unmatched portfolio of digital-asset products. Binance offerings range from trading and finance to education, research, payments, institutional services, Web3 features, and more. We leverage the power of digital assets and blockchain to build an inclusive financial ecosystem to advance the freedom of money and improve financial access for people around the world.


We are looking for a Marketing manager for Peru who shall be leading and executing the local Peru (and Bolivia) Marketing Plan. This includes global campaigns and local campaigns for the local user, plan activations and event participation in the country and engage with the community. Focus is to drive key metrics, through a full funnel approach, from acquisition to engagement and conversion.

jobs.title: Digital Designer
jobs.description: We are seeking an experienced creative and passionate Digital Designer to join our Growth Creative team at Crypto.com. As a Digital Designer, you will play a crucial role in developing engaging and visually appealing digital creative content across various platforms. The ideal candidate possesses a keen eye for design aesthetics, stays abreast of digital trends, and is adept at translating ideas into compelling visuals. This position requires experience in AI tools and offers the flexibility of remote work, allowing you to collaborate effectively from anywhere.

jobs.title: Senior Product Designer - Coinbase One
jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><div class="p-rich_text_section"> <p>As Senior Product Designer, you’ll focus on growth for Coinbase one—one of Consumer’s most important offerings for our most engaged crypto traders and enthusiasts.</p> You’ll help more customers discover, try, and sign up for Coinbase one, ensuring their first impressions are seamless and delightful. You’ll partner with product managers, engineering, data science, and marketing to identify and design high-impact experiences, with a laser focus on&nbsp; acquisition and some parts of activation. A successful candidate will be a strategic, experiment-driven designer who thrives on moving metrics and loves designing experiences that help users discover value quickly, while being willing to make bold bets too.</div> <div class="p-rich_text_section">&nbsp;</div> <div class="p-rich_text_section"><strong data-stringify-type="bold">What you’ll be doing</strong></div> <ul class="p-rich_text_list p-rich_text_list__bullet" data-stringify-type="unordered-list" data-indent="0" data-border="0"> <li>Own the end-to-end user journey and all aspects of design execution, from ideation, to prototyping, to user testing, to final production.</li> <li>Raise the quality bar with rigorous attention to detail, considering edge cases and scalability across all Coinbase One membership offerings.&nbsp;</li> <li>Work cross-functionally with Product, Engineering, and XFN peers to define and execute the product roadmap.</li> <li>Design web and mobile experiences that are simple and intuitive.</li> <li>Participate in regular design critiques to receive and provide feedback on design work.</li> <li data-stringify-indent="0" data-stringify-border="0">&nbsp;</li> </ul> <div class="p-rich_text_section"><strong data-stringify-type="bold">What we look for in you</strong></div> <ul class="p-rich_text_list p-rich_text_list__bullet" data-stringify-type="unordered-list" data-indent="0" data-border="0"> <li>5+ years of product design experience — bonus if you have prior experience with subscription or membership model products.</li> <li>Strong communicator with a track record of influencing product direction and aligning stakeholders on complex products at scale.&nbsp;</li> <li>Sharp attention to detail and mastery over your craft, especially: visual design, interaction design, and prototyping.</li> <li>Balances quality and speed in fast-paced (sometimes ambiguous), cross-functional environments.</li> <li>Fluency in Figma and prototyping tools.</li> <li>Collaborative, low-ego team player with a growth mindset.</li> <li data-stringify-indent="0" data-stringify-border="0">&nbsp;</li> </ul> <div class="p-rich_text_section"><strong data-stringify-type="bold">Nice to haves</strong></div> <ul class="p-rich_text_list p-rich_text_list__bullet" data-stringify-type="unordered-list" data-indent="0" data-border="0"> <li We’re at the forefront of crypto innovations like onchain-capable AI agents, agentic finance, and next-generation payment solutions that are global, fast, and cost-efficient – and we’re just getting started. We’re building APIs, SDKs, and other developer tools across crypto payments, trading, wallets, onchain data, AI/ML, and more. We’re a small team that moves like a startup within Coinbase with a fast pace, strong ownership culture, and a relentless commitment to delighting onchain builders.</p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p>We’re looking for a talented and crypto-forward Product Designer to help bring the world onchain.</p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p><strong>What you’ll be doing</strong></p> <ul> <li>Work in a small team to iteratively improve developer experience</li> <li>Take new features from ideation, to prototyping, to user testing, to production</li> <li>Design web and mobile experiences that are simple and intuitive</li> <li>Participate in regular design reviews where you’ll seek out specific feedback on your designs and incorporate relevant feedback</li> <li>Execute on the product roadmap and help define product ego, collaborative, and open minded</li> <li>Demonstrated interest in crypto products (i.e. active user of DeFi apps, wallets, exchange(s) etc)</li> </ul> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p><strong>Nice to haves</strong></p> <ul> <li>Prior design experience in crypto or financial products</li> <li>Software development experience</li> <li>Startup experience</li> </ul> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p>JOB ID: GDPD05US</p> <p>*Answers to crypto-related questions may be used to evaluate your onchain experience.</p> <p>*For select roles, Coinbase is piloting an AI tool based on machine learning technologies to conduct initial screening interviews to qualified applicants. jobs.title: Director, Global Tax Compliance and Tax Accounting
jobs.description:
We are looking to recruit a Director of Global Tax Compliance and Tax Accounting located in Hong Kong / Singapore to lead the rapidly growing tax compliance and tax accounting team at Crypto.com.

This role offers the successful candidate a fantastic opportunity to manage the group tax compliance and tax accounting and will collaborate with tax team members on several key work streams of the tax function including transfer pricing structuring and tax/finance technology projects.

Reporting to the SVP – Global Head of Tax, the successful candidate will lead a team of direct reports and play a lead role in the group audit review of tax with external auditors and participate in transactions and structuring initiatives.

The ideal candidate will be a team player who leads by example, implements tax plans and works with cross-functional teams to identify value creation opportunities and strategies to mitigate tax risk.

jobs.title: Senior Product Designer - (Institutional, Custody)
jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>Our<a href="https://blog.coinbase.com/the-vision-mission-and-strategy-for-coinbase-944b79a64a7c#.xgrdfvfgc"> vision</a> is to bring more innovation, efficiency, and equality of opportunity to the world by building an open financial system. We aim to be the most trusted company in our domain and create user-focused products that are easier and more delightful to use. The Institutional team at Coinbase plays a critical role in executing that vision. Through the Coinbase Prime product, we’re building the most secure and full-service prime brokerage platform that enables institutions to participate in the crypto-economy. Institutions trust our products with safekeeping their crypto assets, executing trades, lending their custodied assets for yield, and accessing crypto-native features.</p> <p>As a Senior Product Designer, you’ll contribute to our mission, vision, and strategy through a deep understanding of our client and business needs. You are a strong product thinker— able to devise scalable solutions and develop optimal user journeys that help our clients unlock institutional investment strategies. Our team is a tightly knit group of highly talented and motivated individuals that work together in a collaborative environment to solve some of the toughest problems in this space. You’ll work closely with Product Management, Engineering, Product Designers, and Operations to build a true enterprise-grade client experience on Coinbase Prime.&nbsp;</p> <p><strong>What you’ll be doing</strong></p> <ul> <li>Contribute to the overall direction and decision-making for product and design strategy</li> <li>Own the end-to-end user journey and all aspects of design execution from ideation, to prototyping, to user testing, to final production</li> <li>Work cross-functionally with product management, engineering, and XFN peers to help define and execute on the product roadmap</li> <li>Design web and mobile experiences that are simple and intuitive for clients</li> <li>Participate in regular design critiques to receive and provide feedback on design work</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you</strong></p> <ul> <li>5+ years of Product Design experience</li> <li>Exemplary product thinking abilities, solutions oriented, and capable of working autonomously</li> <li>Proven track record of working within a product team to ship successful products to users</li> <li>Sharp attention to detail and mastery over your craft: visual design, interaction design, and prototyping</li> <li>Strong cross-functional communication and stakeholder management experience</li> <li>Thrives in fast-paced (sometimes ambiguous) environment</li> <li>Fluency in Figma and prototyping tools</li> <li>Low ego, loves to collaborate, and open minded</li> <li>Interest in crypto and/or financial products</li> </ul> <p><strong>Nice to haves</strong></p> <ul> <li>Design experience working on TradFi products</li> <li>Crypto-forward experience, including familiarity with onchain activity such as interacting with Ethereum addresses, using ENS, and engaging with dApps or blockchain-based services.</li> </ul> <p><span style=&quot

Binance is a leading global blockchain ecosystem behind the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume and registered users. We are trusted by over 230 million people in 100+ countries for our industry-leading security, user fund transparency, trading engine speed, deep liquidity, and an unmatched portfolio of digital-asset products. Binance offerings range from trading and finance to education, research, payments, institutional services, Web3 features, and more. We leverage the power of digital assets and blockchain to build an inclusive financial ecosystem to advance the freedom of money and improve financial access for people around the world.

About the Pioneer Talent Program 
Are you an early-career professional ready to kickstart your career in the dynamic world of blockchain? Binance’s Pioneer Talent Program is designed to nurture ambitious individuals like you. The program offers full-time roles where participants will gain hands-on expertise via a tailored training curriculum and personalized 1:1 mentorship from industry leaders. Dive behind the scenes of the world’s leading blockchain ecosystem while building the skills to thrive in Web3. Launch your career with purpose—join us in shaping the future of digital innovation.  

Who May Apply
Candidates with up to 5 years of relevant work experience

jobs.title: Senior Product Manager - Consumer Trading (Coinbase Advanced)
jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><div data-block="true" data-editor="7o09r" data-offset-key="1v3si-0-0"> <div class="public-DraftStyleDefault-block public-DraftStyleDefault-ltr" data-offset-key="1v3si-0-0"> <p>As a Product Manager on the Coinbase Advanced Trading team, you will play a pivotal role in enhancing the trading experience for our users. You will lead the ideation, development, and execution of features aimed at improving critical user journeys and driving trading efficiency. Additionally, you will leverage your understanding of trading behaviors to enable advanced trading strategies for our highest volume users.</p> <p><strong>What You Will Be Doing:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Lead the development of features aimed at improving critical user journeys for traders. Identify pain points and user motivations to make trading, which some think is complex and scary, into an easy and delightful product</li> <li>Conceptualize and implement a roadmap that enables derivatives traders to unlock new strategies on web, mobile (iOS/Android), and through API</li> <li>Define metrics and run experiments to evaluate CUJ efficiency and trading execution. Leverage data to continuously optimize product features</li> <li>Own product development from conception to launch, iterating along the way until you create the world’s best products for leverage and hedging</li> <li>Scale and grow usage, ensuring users have access to the products when needed</li> <li>Collaborate cross-functionally with engineering, design, data, marketing, and cross-functional teams to develop and steer product roadmap</li> <li>Define and analyze metrics to guide product development</li> <li>Align teams on a shared vision and steer execution on that vision</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you:</strong></p> <ul> <li>6+ years of experience as a Product Manager and/or Founder, including experience working on consumer products</li> <li>Strong expertise in trading and a strong grasp of financial concepts (i.e. markets, derivative instruments, trading strategies)</li> <li>Experience building 0 to 1 products with high ambiguity and creatively solving problems given any constraint without giving up</li> <li>Strong design sense about product decisions and an understanding of how to create delightful experiences</li> <li>Ability to influence and shape strategic decisions/discussions</li> <li>Experience working with and balancing the needs of a wide variety of stakeholders including users, design, and UXR using both qualitative and quantitative data</li> <li>An entrepreneurial mindset with the ability to succeed in a fast-paced environment</li> <li>Demonstrated passion for cryptocurrency, financial markets, and the Coinbase mission</li> </ul> <p><strong>Nice to Haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Experience in brokerage, market-making, institutional trading, or derivatives products (options, futures, perps, event contracts)</li> <li>Crypto-forward experience, including familiarity with onchain activity such as interacting with Ethereum addresses, using ENS, and engaging with dApps or blockchain-based services</li> </ul> &lt

Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>Coinbase Cloud Security (CloudSec) is looking for a Senior Security Engineer to build security controls and advise engineering teams on secure architecture requirements and best practices. CloudSec is responsible for the safety of cloud and compute platforms on which Coinbase applications are built. As an engineer on the CloudSec team you are a trusted expert on the security of these platforms. You will ensure the security of these platforms through security consultations, configuration reviews, policy-as-code, and development of guardrails and automation.&nbsp;</p> <p><strong>What you’ll be doing (ie. job duties):</strong></p> <ul> <li>Design, implement, and maintain network security controls across multi-cloud (AWS, GCP, etc.) and on-prem infrastructure</li> <li>Enforce network segmentation and firewall rules that minimize blast radius without impairing productivity.</li> <li>Review configuration changes and write policies to detect security invariants.&nbsp;</li> <li>Drive continuous improvement of secure-by-default network patterns for developers.</li> <li>Write code for automations that support security requirements like threat detection, incident containment, and network access management.</li> <li>Partner with engineering teams to review cloud, network and routing architecture design changes.</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you (ie. job requirements):</strong></p> <ul> <li>At least 5 years of experience in cloud security with deep expertise in AWS.</li> <li>At least 2 years of experience in network security and cloud edge security experience.&nbsp;</li> </ul> <ul> <li>An ability to deploy cloud infrastructure with Terraform and to develop automations or guardrails with Golang.</li> <li>An execution-focused mindset, capable of navigating through ambiguity and delivering results.</li> <li>Your passion for building an open financial system that brings the world together drives you to excel in this role.</li> </ul> <p><strong>Nice to haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Proficiency in crafting Rego rules for Open Policy Agent (OPA) or comparable policy-as-code solutions.</li> <li>Experience with both GCP and/or on-premise infrastructure.</li> </ul> <ul> <li>Have worked with detection platforms like Wiz, AWS Config.</li> </ul> <p>Position ID: P72358</p> <p>#LI-Remote</p> <div jobs.title: Growth Manager
jobs.description:
We’re looking for a Growth Marketing Manager with a strong background in mass-market tech services to lead user acquisition and engagement for our consumer app. You’ll help define the value proposition, shape customer segmentation, and drive growth through strategic, data-driven marketing.

Success in this role requires a deep understanding of app monetization, user behavior, and competitive positioning—especially in productivity or interactive entertainment apps. You’ll own and optimize paid acquisition campaigns across major channels, with a focus on performance, creativity, and scalability.

This is a great opportunity for a commercially minded marketer who can turn product insights into impactful growth strategies in a fast-moving, competitive space.

jobs.title: HR, Associate/ Senior HR Associate
jobs.description:
As we continue our steady expansion across the Middle East, we are seeking a dedicated HR professional to join our team in a pivotal role. Based in our strategic UAE hub, you will provide critical, on-the-ground support and bring the essential local expertise our team needs to thrive. 

Reporting to the Regional HR Director, you will be a key connector for our regional operations, taking ownership of HR tasks for the Middle East to ensure we maintain our high level of service. This is a fantastic opportunity to make a significant impact, working closely with our teams in the UK and across the globe during a key period of growth.


Responsibilities
No two days are the same in this dynamic role! You will champion the entire employee lifecycle, from coordinating a warm and welcoming onboarding for new joiners to ensuring a smooth off-boarding process.

As the friendly, first point of contact for our employees, you'll provide timely support and manage all HR-related queries. Your core responsibilities will also include maintaining immaculate employee records in our HRIS, managing the end-to-end visa application (via AXS) and renewal process, and playing a key role in the payroll and benefits administration for our diverse teams across the region. 

You will also collaborate closely with departments like IT to set up new starters for success and provide vital support to regional and global teams on various projects that shape our people strategy.

jobs.title: Research Scientist - LLM Foundation Models
jobs.description:
Binance is a leading global blockchain ecosystem behind the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume and registered users. We are trusted by over 280 million people in 100+ countries for our industry-leading security, user fund transparency, trading engine speed, deep liquidity, and an unmatched portfolio of digital-asset products. Binance offerings range from trading and finance to education, research, payments, institutional services, Web3 features, and more. We leverage the power of digital assets and blockchain to build an inclusive financial ecosystem to advance the freedom of money and improve financial access for people around the world.


About the Role
We are seeking a highly skilled Research Scientist/Engineer to advance the reasoning and planning capabilities of large foundation models. In this role, you will enhance model performance across the entire development lifecycle—including data acquisition, supervised fine-tuning (SFT), reward modelling, and reinforcement learning—while driving innovations in reasoning and decision-making. You will synthesise large-scale, high-quality datasets through rewriting, augmentation, and generation techniques to strengthen foundation models during pretraining, SFT, and RL stages. A key part of the role involves solving complex tasks using System 2 thinking and applying advanced decoding strategies such as MCTS and A*. You will design and implement robust evaluation methodologies, teach models to interact with external tools, APIs, and code interpreters, and build agents and multi-agent systems capable of addressing sophisticated real-world problems.

jobs.title: Institutional Sales Manager
jobs.description:
About the Role: 

Define and build your institutional / high-net worth clientele - in the fast-growing crypto & blockchain industry, there are no limits to who your clients are (or could potentially be)! 

You take ownership & lead in flexibly identifying & pitching institutional leads. Take pride in successes that could come in various shapes - from onboarding a client to their first crypto instrument, to customizing a crypto product for your client that the market has never seen before.

Craft and tailor your products - the journey of bringing traditional financial services products to crypto has just begun, you have a say in tailoring what you pitch to institutional clients. You are encouraged to put your creativity & expertise to full use: identify other financial services offerings that may be of interest (e.g., credit, custody) - and you will have the full support of theCrypto.com team to bring a new product into fruition!

jobs.title: Risk Analyst, Fraud
jobs.description:
Binance is a leading global blockchain ecosystem behind the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume and registered users. We are trusted by over 280 million people in 100+ countries for our industry-leading security, user fund transparency, trading engine speed, deep liquidity, and an unmatched portfolio of digital-asset products. Binance offerings range from trading and finance to education, research, payments, institutional services, Web3 features, and more. We leverage the power of digital assets and blockchain to build an inclusive financial ecosystem to advance the freedom of money and improve financial access for people around the world.


About the Role
 As a Risk Analyst, you will play a critical role in safeguarding our users and platform from fraudulent activity. You will investigate suspicious behaviours, design effective risk strategies, and develop controls that protect potential victims while blocking malicious actors. This role requires strong analytical skills, investigative curiosity, and the ability to collaborate across multiple teams to ensure the highest standards of security and trust.

jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. You will help build the next generation of systems to make cryptocurrency accessible to everyone across the globe, operating real-time applications with high frequency, low latency updates, and managing the most secure, dockerized infrastructure running in the cloud.</span></p> <p><strong>What you'll be doing:</strong></p> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Build new services to meet critical product and business needs using Golang.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Design scalable systems to solve novel problems with modern cloud technology and industry best practices.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Articulate a long term vision for maintaining and scaling our backend systems and the teams running them.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Work with engineers, designers, product managers and senior leadership to turn our product and technical vision into a tangible roadmap every quarter.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">Write high quality, well tested code to meet the needs of your customers.</span></li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you:</strong></p> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You have at least 5 years of experience in software engineering.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You’ve designed, built, scaled and maintained production services, and know how to compose a service oriented architecture.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You write high quality, well tested code to meet the needs of your customers.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You’re passionate about building an open financial system that brings the world together.</span></li> </ul> <p><strong>Nice to haves:

jobs.title: Risk Operation Specialist - Transaction Monitoring (EST timezone)
jobs.description:
Binance is a leading global blockchain ecosystem behind the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume and registered users. We are trusted by over 280 million people in 100+ countries for our industry-leading security, user fund transparency, trading engine speed, deep liquidity, and an unmatched portfolio of digital-asset products. Binance offerings range from trading and finance to education, research, payments, institutional services, Web3 features, and more. We leverage the power of digital assets and blockchain to build an inclusive financial ecosystem to advance the freedom of money and improve financial access for people around the world.


Binance's Risk team is looking for an experienced Risk Operation Specialist to implement effective Risk strategies to Binance platform and users. 

You will be required to work through several pre-determined fraudulent alerts, email alerts, SMS alerts, and service requests to determine if recent account activity is of a fraudulent nature. You will complete your investigation using multiple resources including customer contact, reviewing account activity, account rating, phone matches, IP Search, and various websites, etc. Risk Operations Agents are customer oriented and work to deliver a better understanding of our account processes to our customer.

At the same time, you will educate customers on how to maintain security and strive for loss prevention for both our account and its customers. You are responsible for reviewing documentation, analyzing data, and determining on time whether to verify the authenticity of transactions and/or activities. Throughout this process, you may need to communicate with the customer for additional information and to notify them of decisions. An agent within Risk Operations is organized, efficient, and driven, exhibits strong analytical skills, adapts well to change, and thrives in a collaborative team environment.

jobs.title: Language Quality Specialist
jobs.description: Crypto.com is a leading fintech company looking for a Language Quality Specialist to join our Localization team. In this role, you will play a critical part in enhancing our global user experience by ensuring high linguistic quality across 20+ languages. You will be responsible for implementing scalable quality assurance processes, partnering closely with cross-functional teams, and driving continuous improvement across our product and marketing content.We’re looking for someone passionate about language, meticulous in quality, and experienced in managing localization quality at scale in fast-paced environments.

If you are experienced with Crypto, it’s a big plus!</li> <li>You’ve experienced architecting and developing solutions to ambiguous problems with significant impact</li> <li>You’re passionate about building an indexing platform that brings the Web3 and Web2 world together</li> </ul> <p><strong>&nbsp;Nice to haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Experience designing and developing distributed systems</li> <li>You have gone through a rapid growth in your company (from 10 to 100s of engineers)</li> <li>You have experience with Blockchains (such as Bitcoin, Ethereum etc.)</li> <li>You have experience decomposing a large monolith into microservices</li> <li>You’ve worked with Golang, Kafka, Redis, S3, Clickhouse, MongoDB</li> <li>You’ve built financial, high reliability or security systems</li> <li><span style="font-weight: 400;">Crypto-forward experience, including familiarity with onchain activity such as interacting with Ethereum addresses, using ENS, and engaging with dApps or blockchain-based services.</span></li> </ul> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Job #: GPBE05US</span></p> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">*Answers to crypto-related questions may be used to evaluate your onchain experience</span></p> <p>#LI-Remote</p> </div> <div id="fortidlp-input-element-parent"></div><div class="content-pay-transparency"><div class="pay-input"><div class="description"><span style="font-weight: 400;"><strong>Pay Transparency Notice:

jobs.title: Legal Counsel - Capital Markets - European Union (EU)
jobs.description:
The Legal Team provides legal and regulatory advice to ensure that all Crypto.com products and services are compliant per local regulations while also meeting the needs of Crypto.com customers. The Legal Team interfaces externally with regulators and service providers in order to demonstrate compliance with applicable law and regulation for Crypto.com. 

This role will report to the Global Head of Capital Markets, Legal and will also work closely with the Legal Team in the EU. The primary focus for this role will be to serve as the Legal Team’s expert on the law and regulations applicable to EU Investment Firms and the products offered throughout the EU. The Legal Team provides proactive and solution-oriented legal and regulatory advice and guidance to multiple stakeholders to enable the development and launch of Crypto.com products and services in a way that meets our obligations as well as the needs of our customers.  Work cross-functionally to identify, analyze, and mitigate legal and regulatory risks (while maximizing commercial opportunities) related to the introduction of new products and services.  Also represents Crypto.com on a variety of topics before regulators, financial partners, and other external audiences.

jobs.title: Legal Counsel - Capital Markets - European Union (EU)
jobs.description:
The Legal Team provides legal and regulatory advice to ensure that all Crypto.com products and services are compliant per local regulations while also meeting the needs of Crypto.com customers. The Legal Team interfaces externally with regulators and service providers in order to demonstrate compliance with applicable law and regulation for Crypto.com. 

This role will report to the Global Head of Capital Markets, Legal and will also work closely with the Legal Team in the EU. The primary focus for this role will be to serve as the Legal Team’s expert on the law and regulations applicable to EU Investment Firms and the products offered throughout the EU. The Legal Team provides proactive and solution-oriented legal and regulatory advice and guidance to multiple stakeholders to enable the development and launch of Crypto.com products and services in a way that meets our obligations as well as the needs of our customers.  Work cross-functionally to identify, analyze, and mitigate legal and regulatory risks (while maximizing commercial opportunities) related to the introduction of new products and services.  Also represents Crypto.com on a variety of topics before regulators, financial partners, and other external audiences.

jobs.title: Legal Counsel - Capital Markets - European Union (EU)
jobs.description:
The Legal Team provides legal and regulatory advice to ensure that all Crypto.com products and services are compliant per local regulations while also meeting the needs of Crypto.com customers. The Legal Team interfaces externally with regulators and service providers in order to demonstrate compliance with applicable law and regulation for Crypto.com. 

This role will report to the Global Head of Capital Markets, Legal and will also work closely with the Legal Team in the EU. The primary focus for this role will be to serve as the Legal Team’s expert on the law and regulations applicable to EU Investment Firms and the products offered throughout the EU. The Legal Team provides proactive and solution-oriented legal and regulatory advice and guidance to multiple stakeholders to enable the development and launch of Crypto.com products and services in a way that meets our obligations as well as the needs of our customers.  Work cross-functionally to identify, analyze, and mitigate legal and regulatory risks (while maximizing commercial opportunities) related to the introduction of new products and services.  Also represents Crypto.com on a variety of topics before regulators, financial partners, and other external audiences.

jobs.title: Structured Product Controller
jobs.description:
Binance is a leading global blockchain ecosystem behind the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume and registered users. We are trusted by over 280 million people in 100+ countries for our industry-leading security, user fund transparency, trading engine speed, deep liquidity, and an unmatched portfolio of digital-asset products. Binance offerings range from trading and finance to education, research, payments, institutional services, Web3 features, and more. We leverage the power of digital assets and blockchain to build an inclusive financial ecosystem to advance the freedom of money and improve financial access for people around the world.


Job Summary: As a Structured Product Controller at Binance, you will play a critical role in designing, analyzing, and managing innovative structured financial products within the crypto ecosystem. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams including business unit, risk, legal, and product development to create tailored solutions that meet client needs, optimize returns, and manage risk in a rapidly evolving digital asset market.

In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>The Developer Experience (DevX) org empowers our engineers to develop, build, test, and release high quality code quickly and reliably.&nbsp; We do this by building products and systems that cater to the needs of Coinbase engineers.</p> <p>As a key member of the Mobile DevX team, you'll shape the future of mobile development at Coinbase. You'll work with React Native and Expo, crafting innovative tools that enhance the developer experience and streamline app releases. This role offers the unique opportunity to influence the mobile ecosystem at a leading fintech company, collaborating with top-tier engineers and driving impactful projects that reach millions of users. <li>Excellent problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to improving developer experiences.</li> <li>Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.</li> </ul> <p><strong>Nice to haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>A track record of contributing to high-quality, scalable mobile applications.</li> <li>Experience with mobile infrastructure and developer tooling.</li> <li>Familiarity with Swift or Kotlin.</li> <li>Knowledge of cross-platform development practices.</li> <li>Previous experience in a fintech or tech company known for mobile innovation.</li> </ul> <p>Job #: GPFE05US</p> <p>#LI-Remote</p> <div id="fortidlp-input-element-parent"></div><div class="content-pay-transparency"><div class="pay-input"><div We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>The mission of the Risk Platform Team is to foster business growth by effectively managing financial risks impacting the business and its users. We build flexible, scalable, and customizable engineering systems to detect and prevent fraud, incorporating mechanisms for real-time, near-real-time, and scheduled workflows.</p> <p>Coinbase is seeking experienced Frontend Engineers to join our team to build out the next generation of crypto-forward products and features. You will help build the next generation of systems to make cryptocurrency accessible to everyone across the globe.</p> <p><strong>What you’ll be doing (ie. job duties):</strong></p> <ul> <li>Shape the next generation of Risk Platform architecture that powers Coinbase.</li> <li>Articulate a long term technical direction and vision for maintaining and scaling our web and mobile platforms.</li> <li>Create trustworthy user experiences by building interfaces that are simple, easy to comprehend, performant and reliable using modern tools like React, React Native, Typescript, React Navigation, Jest and Webpack.</li> <li>Turn our vision into a tangible roadmap every quarter by working with engineers, product managers and senior leadership.</li> <li>Mentor and train other team members on design techniques and coding standards.</li> <li>Add positive energy in every meeting, and make your coworkers feel included in every interaction.</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you:</strong></p> <ul> <li>You have at least 5 years of experience in software engineering, developing web apps and shipping user-facing features with JavaScript and modern, component-based JS frameworks like React.</li> <li>You've developed and shipped user-facing features using component-based UI frameworks.</li> <li>You’re familiar with current trends and best practices in front-end architecture, including performance, security and usability.</li> <li>You’re familiar with product and design lifecycles, and collaborating closely with designers, engineers, and product managers.</li> <li>You write high quality, well tested code to meet the needs of your customers.</li> </ul> <p><strong>Nice to haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>You've worked on front-end teams in the finance or compliance space.</li> <li>You have at least 1 year of experience in developing React Native mobile apps or helped move existing native apps to React Native.</li> </ul> <p>Job #: GPFE05US</p> <p>#LI-Remote</p><div class="content-pay-transparency"><div class="pay-input"><div class="description"><span style="font-weight: 400;"><strong>Pay Transparency Notice:</strong> Depending distributed systems.</li> <li>You have in-depth, hands-on experience with large-scale database deployments in a production environment.</li> <li>You have experience in cloud distributed databases (e.g., MongoDB, Postgres, RDS, Aurora, DynamoDB, Redis, Memcached).</li> <li>You have a solid understanding of distributed database architecture, performance tuning and reliability.</li> <li>You have backend service and tool development experience in Golang, Java or Python.</li> <li>You have strong communication skills to work effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.</li> </ul> <p><strong>Nice to haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Crypto-forward experience, including familiarity with onchain activity such as interacting with Ethereum addresses, using ENS, and engaging with Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>Coinbase is seeking a Senior Staff Engineer to join our team and build out the next generation of crypto-forward products and features. You will solve unique, large scale, highly complex technical problems, bridging the constraints posed by web-scale applications and blockchain technology. You will help build the next generation of systems to make cryptocurrency accessible to everyone across the globe, operating real-time applications with high frequency, low latency updates, and managing the most secure infrastructure running in the cloud.</p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p>The Growth organization drives Coinbase’s mission of bringing the world onchain. By building and leveraging growth tools across multiple avenues, including referral and incentives programs, creating a world-class notifications system, building a dynamic, engaging, and accessible logged-out web experience, and optimizing our new user onboarding flow, we ensure that Coinbase is the easiest, safest, and fastest way to buy, hold, and trade Crypto assets, and ensure our new users are set up for success from their first interaction.</p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p><strong>What you’ll be doing (ie. job duties):</strong></p> <ul> <li>Partner with the Head of Growth Engineering (Sr. Director of Eng), EMs, and Product Managers to improve incentives infrastructure, primitives and scale up our spend/profitability with high reliability and confidence.</li> <li>Build foundational systems and primitives to drive growth at Coinbase.</li> </ul> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p><strong>What we look for in you:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Ability to drive multi-quarter roadmaps with complex dependencies within and outside the Growth team.</li> <li>Strong track record of "horizontal" technical leadership across a larger team or multiple small teams.</li> <li>Ability to drive quality and performance across complex systems at scale and understand what metrics and SLOs reflect product quality and how to move them.&nbsp;</li> </ul> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p><strong>Nice to haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Strong cross-functional partnership skills, as this role spans both incentives experience and infrastructure pods, with potential to support all of Growth.</li> <li>Experience in consumer or growth-focused engineering is a plus.</li> <li>Experience working with ML directly or via APIs is a nice-to-have (understand different online and offline model evaluation techniques, and opportunities for ML to impact and improve core user experience).</li> </ul> <p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p> <p>Job ID: GPBE07US</p> <div id="fortidlp-input-element-parent"></div><div class="content-pay-transparency"><div jobs.title: Senior Staff Software Engineer, Backend (Consumer - Trading)
jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>Coinbase’s mission is to increase economic freedom in the world, and the Consumer Trading team plays a critical role in that vision by building the fastest, easiest, and most trusted crypto trading platform globally. The team is made up of engineers who take pride in high ownership, strong technical depth, and long-term thinking. We value team members who drive clarity in ambiguity, lead through influence, and raise the bar in engineering and product excellence.</p> <p>We’re looking for a deeply technical Senior Staff Software Engineer with expertise in trading systems to help define and deliver the next generation of Coinbase’s trading platform. You’ll lead multi-quarter initiatives across orgs, mentor engineers, and shape critical technical architecture in trading -- from order lifecycle management to execution infrastructure.</p> <p><strong>What you’ll be doing (ie. job duties):</strong></p> <ul> <li>Drive the technical vision and execution of complex, multi-quarter projects across multiple engineering teams.</li> <li>Architect and build mission-critical trading systems, including order management, execution engines, and reliability infrastructure.</li> <li>Partner with PM, Design, and other functions to align product strategy with long-term technical bets.</li> <li>Deeply understand and influence our trading stack and product roadmap.</li> <li>Mentor and coach IC6s and below; help grow the next generation of trading and infrastructure leaders.</li> <li>Elevate engineering quality through design review, code review, and promoting best practices.</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you:</strong></p> <ul> <li>10+ years of software engineering experience, with a strong track record of shipping large-scale distributed systems.</li> <li>Deep expertise in trading systems (traditional or crypto), with hands-on experience in areas like order management, execution algorithms, market data, or risk management.</li> <li>You are customer-obsessed and bring strong product intuition to technical decision-making.</li> <li>Proven ability to lead complex initiatives across organizational boundaries.</li> <li>Strong mentoring skills with a passion for leveling up teammates.</li> <li>Comfortable working in ambiguous environments with high stakes and high velocity.</li> <li>High bar for quality, correctness, and operational excellence.</li> </ul> <p><strong>&nbsp;Nice to haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>You’ve been part of a company that builds complicated trading systems</li> <li>Prior experience in financial markets, especially equities, FX, or crypto.</li> <li>Familiarity with regulated environments and designing for compliance and auditability.</li> <li>Experience working with Go or other performant backend languages.</li> <li>Contributions to open source or trading protocols.</li> <li>Crypto-forward experience, including familiarity with onchain activity such as interacting with Ethereum addresses, using ENS, and engaging with dApps or blockchain-based services</li> </ul> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p>Job ID: GCBE07US</p> <p><span style="font-weight

jobs.title: Regulatory Compliance Manager, Malta
jobs.description:
Our Local Programs and Regulatory Compliance team is responsible for ensuring compliance with local laws and regulations in the countries where we operate.


About the role:
The Compliance Manager will report to the country’s Compliance Officer and support Crypto.com’s regulated businesses in their regulatory compliance obligations.  You will assist with the management of regulatory examinations and compliance independent reviews/external audits, regulatory reporting, and program documentation. You will also support the Compliance Officer to ensure that robust policies and controls are in place across Crypto.com’s regulated businesses and that they remain in line with regulatory change.

Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>Coinbase is seeking experienced backend engineers to join our Trading team to build and scale the core systems that power crypto trading at Coinbase. From Simple Trade for everyday users to Advanced Trade for professionals, to Derivatives and Decentralized (DEX) trading, we’re building a seamless and secure trading experience for everyone. This is a rare opportunity to work at the intersection of crypto, trading infrastructure, and consumer product — tackling exciting engineering challenges while contributing directly to Coinbase’s core business.<br><br></p> <p><strong>What you'll be doing:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Power highly performant, highly available systems for traders worldwide</li> <li>Architect robust systems that are easy to build on top of supporting many instrument types (Spot, Futures, Perpetual Futures, and more)</li> <li>Work in tight collaboration with product and design to articulate a best-in-class product experience</li> <li>Translate your best ideas into tangible, high value features our customers love</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you:</strong></p> <ul> <li>You have at least 2+ years of experience in software engineering, especially with web-scale traffic</li> <li>You’ve designed, built, scaled, and maintained production services as they evolve over time</li> <li>You have a high bar for product excellence, pairing customer obsession with comprehensive observability</li> <li>You empower and cultivate your teammates. Iron sharpens iron.</li> <li>You take pride in being up-to-date with the latest industry standards and best practices</li> </ul> <p><strong>Nice to haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>You’ve worked on active trading systems or other similar high availability financial systems</li> <li>You actively trade crypto or other financial instruments</li> <li>You have gone through a rapid growth in your company (from startup to mid-size).</li> <li>You have experience upgrading significant parts of legacy systems, or re-architecting next-generation versions of existing systems</li> <li>You’ve worked with Golang, MongoDB, Redis before</li> <li>You have Crypto-forward experience, including familiarity with onchain activity.</li> </ul> <p>Job #: GCBE04CA</p> <p>*Answers to crypto-related questions may be used to evaluate your onchain experience.</p> <p>#LI-Remote</p> <p><em>For select roles, Coinbase is piloting an AI tool</em><em> b</em><em>ased on machine learning technologies to conduct initial screening interviews to qualified applicants. The tool simulates realistic interview scenarios and engages in dynamic conversation. Your interview responses, in the form of a voice recording and/or transcript will be assessed in terms of the job qualifications and characteristics listed in the position description above by a human recruiter.&nbsp;&nbsp;</em></p> <p><em>For other select roles, Coinbase is piloting BrightHire, an AI interview intelligence platform, to transcribe and summarize interview notes, allowing our interviewers to fully focus on you as the candidate.&nbsp;</em></p

Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p><span style="font-weight: 400;">The <strong>Institutional Product Group</strong> enables the foundations of Coinbase's institutional business supporting thousands of large financial institutions. We enable institutions to custody their digital assets and participate in the crypto economy in a secure and safe way. We take pride in building a scalable &amp; secure crypto platform supporting hundreds of assets and enabling crypto participation with staking, governance and web3 gateways. The team has interesting work on building cutting-edge crypto technologies, scalable infrastructure and UI surfaces across web, mobile and browser extensions in a fast-paced industry with an opportunity to build several new initiatives</span></p> <p>The<strong> Institutional Financing Engineering team</strong> is responsible for building and maintaining the systems required to safely manage billions of dollars of loans across a number of different products, including Portfolio Margin, Trade Finance, Agency Lending, Bilateral Lending and more. Financing is incredibly important to the Prime Brokerage business because it allows customers to use leverage on their trading positions, as well as generate yield on long holdings. Financing products are important because they generate recurring revenue (as opposed to transaction revenue), but it also increases trading activity and encourages assets to be held on platform.</p> <p><strong>What you'll be doing:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Design and implement new financing products and features</li> <li>Create and build new reporting, monitoring, tools, frameworks and APIs</li> <li>Collaborate with engineers, product managers and senior leadership to turn our vision into a tangible deliverables every quarter</li> <li>Improving developer efficiency, engineering excellence, and operational excellence</li> <li>Provide support to operations and other engineering teams</li> <li>Mentor team members and help uplift the technical skill set across the team</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you:</strong></p> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You have at least 2+ years of experience in software engineering.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You’ve designed, built, scaled and maintained production services, and know how to compose a service oriented architecture.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You write high quality, well tested code to meet the needs of your customers.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You’re passionate about building an open financial system that brings the world together.</span></li> </ul> <p><strong>Nice to haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>You’ve worked with some or all of: Golang, Postgres, Kafka, Protobuf, and React.</li> <li>You’ve built financial, high reliability or security systems.</li> </ul> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Job #: P71947</span></p> &l
