It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p><strong>Coinbase's Platform Product Group is hiring for&nbsp;experienced backend engineers</strong>&nbsp;to join our team to build out the next generation of crypto-forward products and features.&nbsp; You will solve unique, large scale, highly complex technical problems, bridging the constraints posed by web-scale applications and blockchain technology. You will help build the next generation of systems to make cryptocurrency accessible to everyone across the globe, operating real-time applications with high frequency, low latency updates, and managing the most secure, dockerized infrastructure running in the cloud.</p> <p><strong>The Platform Product Group’s mission is to build a trusted, scalable, and compliant platform to maximize velocity, efficiency and quality.</strong> They build the foundations that can be used by multiple products and teams at Coinbase so that users can have a consistent and high-quality experience.&nbsp; There are many teams that make up the Platform Product Group.&nbsp; <strong>We are currently hiring backend engineers to join our pods within our Identity, FinHub and Payments teams.&nbsp;</strong></p> <p><strong>What you'll be doing:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Build new services to meet critical product and business needs using Golang.</li> <li>Design scalable systems to solve novel problems with modern cloud technology and industry best practices.</li> <li>Work with engineers, designers, product managers and senior leadership to turn our product and technical vision into a tangible roadmap every quarter.</li> <li>Write high quality, well tested code to meet the needs of your customers.</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you:</strong></p> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You have at least 2+ years of experience in software engineering.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You’ve designed, built, scaled and maintained production services, and know how to compose a service oriented architecture.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You write high quality, well tested code to meet the needs of your customers.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You’re passionate about building an open financial system that brings the world together.</span></li> </ul> <p><strong>Nice to haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You have gone through a rapid growth in your company (from startup to mid-size).</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You have experience with Blockchains (such as Bitcoin, Ethereum etc.)</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;">You have experience decomposing a large monolith into microservices.</span></li> <li style="font-weight: 400;"><span style="font-weight: 400;&quo

jobs.title: Senior Mobile Developer (React Native) - Onchain Wallet
jobs.description:
We are a team to design, develop, maintain, and improve software for various ventures projects, i.e., projects that are adjacent to our core businesses and are bootstrapped fast with a lean team. You will be actively involved in the design of various components behind scalable applications, from frontend UI to backend infrastructure.

The Onchain team is dedicated to delivering a secure and user-friendly multi-chain digital currency wallet. It enables users to unlock the full potential of their crypto assets while providing seamless access to DeFi, dApps, and trading functionalities—all in one platform.

jobs.title: Senior Product Data Analyst
jobs.description:
Our Product Management team drives product initiatives from inception through execution, makes impacts and launches products/features across our global footprint. We collaborate closely with engineers, designers, analysts, marketers, and other cross-functional team members to ship remarkable features and products.

About the role
We are looking for a Senior Product Analyst to drive data-backed decision-making and shape the future of our product offerings. In this role, you will leverage both on-chain and off-chain data to provide strategic insights, optimize product performance, and drive experimentation to enhance user experience and business outcomes.

jobs.title: Senior Product Designer
jobs.description:
About the role: 

We’re looking for a Senior Product Designer who sets a high bar for both design craft and product thinking. You’ll lead end-to-end initiatives across web and mobile, shaping core experiences that demand clarity, speed, and trust. You care deeply about visual quality. You obsess over the details that build confidence. You’re fluent in user-centered thinking, grounded in research, and comfortable influencing direction at a strategic level.

This role isn’t about slotting into a narrow problem space. It’s for someone who can flex across journeys, uncover the right problems to solve, and raise the standard of execution across the board. Your work will shape products that millions rely on, driving trust and confidence in a rapidly evolving crypto and financial ecosystem.

You’ll work closely with your product partners to build products and engineering strategies to launch + scale this brand new effort.</p> <p><strong>What you'll be doing:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Building and helping design elegant and functional user experiences.</li> <li>Owning and implementing product experiences that directly drive revenue for the company.</li> <li>Working with engineers, product managers and senior leadership to turn our vision into a tangible roadmap every quarter.</li> <li>Adding positive energy in every meeting, and making your coworkers feel included in every interaction.</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you:</strong></p> <ul> <li>You have at least 2+ years of experience in developing web apps and shipping user-facing features with JavaScript and modern, component-based JS frameworks like React.&nbsp;</li> <li>You've developed and shipped user-facing features using component-based UI frameworks.</li> <li>You’re familiar with current trends and best practices in front-end architecture, including performance, security and usability.</li> <li>You’re familiar with product and design lifecycles, and collaborating closely with designers, engineers, and product managers.</li> <li>You write high quality, well tested code to meet the needs of your customers.</li> </ul> <p><strong>Nice to haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Experience with building high fidelity in-app chat experiences.</li> <li>Experience with crypto or financial exchanges.</li> <li>Crypto-forward experience, including familiarity with onchain activity such as interacting with Ethereum addresses, using ENS, and engaging with dApps or blockchain-based services.</li> </ul><div class="content-pay-transparency"><div class="pay-input"><div class="description"><span style="font-weight: 400;"><strong>Pay Transparency Notice:</strong> Depending on your work location, the target annual salary for this position can range as detailed below. Full time offers from Coinbase also include </span><span style="font-weight: 400;">target bonus + target equity + benefits (including medical, dental, vision and 401(k)).</span></div

jobs.title: Senior Product Designer
jobs.description:
About the role: 

We’re looking for a Senior Product Designer who sets a high bar for both design craft and product thinking. You’ll lead end-to-end initiatives across web and mobile, shaping core experiences that demand clarity, speed, and trust. You care deeply about visual quality. You obsess over the details that build confidence. You’re fluent in user-centered thinking, grounded in research, and comfortable influencing direction at a strategic level.

This role isn’t about slotting into a narrow problem space. It’s for someone who can flex across journeys, uncover the right problems to solve, and raise the standard of execution across the board. Your work will shape products that millions rely on, driving trust and confidence in a rapidly evolving crypto and financial ecosystem.

jobs.title: Software Engineer, Frontend - Risk Platform
jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>The mission of the Risk Platform Team is to foster business growth by effectively managing financial risks impacting the business and its users. jobs.title: Software Engineer, Infrastructure - Platform (Compute)
jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>The mission of the Platform Product Group engineers is to build a trusted, scalable and compliant platform to operate with speed, efficiency and quality. Our teams build and maintain the platforms critical to the existence of Coinbase. There are many teams that make up this group which include Product Foundations (i.e. Identity, Payment, Risk, Proofing &amp; Regulatory, Finhub), Machine Learning, Customer Experience, and Infrastructure.</p> <p>The Compute team builds and operates the Kubernetes platform at Coinbase, which is the primary compute orchestration infrastructure for services at Coinbase. We work towards continuously improving the scalability, reliability, efficiency, and operational experience of using Kubernetes at Coinbase, working closely with the Routing, Security, Reliability, and Observability teams (among many others).</p> <p><strong>What you’ll be doing (ie. job duties):</strong></p> <ul> <li>Build tooling and automation to make management of our Kubernetes clusters easy and reliable.</li> <li>Build tooling and automation to improve the developer and operational experience of working with Kubernetes for all users.</li> <li>Operationalize our Kubernetes platform so that it continues to be automated and self-healing to prevent unnecessary oncall burden.</li> <li>Develop net-new Kubernetes-related capabilities for service owners at Coinbase (e.g. one off jobs, cron, different deployment strategies, support for EFS, automated right sizing).</li> <li>Support our customers as they operate critical services for Coinbase in Kubernetes.</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you (ie. job requirements):</strong></p> <ul> <li>You have at least 2+ years of software engineering experience, ideally with some knowledge of Kubernetes, or similar compute orchestration systems (e.g. mesos, nomad)</li> <li>Working AWS and/or GCP infrastructure knowledge</li> <li>Ability to build backend services in addition to infrastructure</li> <li>Ability to hold a high bar for quality, are a self starter, and have strong interpersonal skills</li> <li>Strong problem solving skills and ability to identify problems, determine their root cause, and see them through to solution</li> <li>Ability to balance business needs with technical solutions.</li> </ul> <p><strong>Nice to Have:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Crypto-forward experience, including familiarity with on chain activity such as interacting with Ethereum addresses, using ENS, and engaging with dApps or blockchain-based services.</li> </ul> <p>Job #: P70960</p> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">*Answers to crypto-related questions may be used to evaluate your onchain experience</span></p> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">#LI-Remote</span></p><div class="content-pay-transparency"><div jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>The Search &amp; Recommendations Team is a highly ambitious group dedicated to building a recommendations platform that accelerates adoption of ML/AI solutions for personalizing the user experience across the entire Coinbase ecosystem.<br><br>Our mission is to democratize access to advanced ML based discovery and personalization solutions by building representation of key entities like users, cryptocurrencies, ENS, NFTs as embeddings, and provide personalized ranking, discovery and recommendations frameworks for all Coinbase teams. As a Machine Learning Platform Engineer on our team, you’ll be driving this transformative shift within the company. You’ll work with state-of-the-art AI and ML models, frameworks, and tools, playing a pivotal role in shaping how people and businesses engage with and benefit from AI in the future.</p> <p><strong>What you’ll be doing (ie. job duties)</strong>:</p> <ul> <li>Design and develop a centralized platform for all Search&amp;Recommendations use cases at Coinbase.</li> <li>Advocate for and ensure adoption of the platform across teams.</li> <li>Excel at project execution by managing priorities, deadlines, and deliverables, leveraging your technical expertise.</li> <li>Write high-quality, well-tested code to address critical product and business needs.</li> <li>Build scalable, secure systems using modern cloud technologies and industry best practices.</li> <li>Debug complex technical issues to enhance system reliability, scalability, and ease of operation.</li> <li>Review and ensure the security, scalability, and architectural integrity of feature designs across teams.</li> <li>Build pipelines to integrate with third-party vendors and streamline workflows.</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you (ie. job requirements)</strong>:</p> <ul> <li>3+ years of experience in software engineering.</li> <li>Proven expertise in building and maintaining production services, with a strong understanding of micro-services architecture.</li> <li>Experience with streaming and batch data processing pipeline on top of Kafka, Spark, Snowflake or similar technologies.</li> <li>Ability to write high-quality, well-tested code that meets customer needs.</li> <li>Deep understanding of what high-quality code and software engineering processes look like, and the ability to foster an environment that promotes them.</li> <li>Strong technical skills in system design and coding&nbsp;&nbsp;</li> <li>Good high-level grasp of AI/ML concepts like LLMs, GNNs, Deep Learning, Logistic Regression, or Gradient Boosting Trees.</li> <li>Passion for building an open financial system that unites the world.</li> <li>Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a preference for open and transparent cultural practices.</li> </ul> <p><strong>Nice to haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Experience navigating rapid company growth (e.g., from startup to mid-size).</li> <li>Familiarity with Python, GoLang, Docker, Postgres, MongoDB.</li> <li>Background in Search, Recommendations and ML infrastructure is a strong plus.</li> </ul> <p>Job ID: GPMLP04US

jobs.title: Senior Product Designer (Exchange)
jobs.description:
Who are we?
At Crypto.com, we are on a mission to accelerate the world’s transition to cryptocurrency. Since 2016 we have grown to be one of the world’s most used and trusted exchanges through our focus on regulation and quality product experiences.

The Opportunity
Crypto.com is looking for a Product Design Manager to drive and lead a group of designers in the Exchange division. You’ll play a pivotal role in shaping the design direction across multiple products within the web and mobile apps, supporting product designers, collaborating with product managers, and creating a positive environment for your team to deliver high quality design.

Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>&nbsp;</p> <p>As an Applied Scientist sitting within our Data Science organization, you will be responsible for building cutting edge models to navigate critical tradeoffs to drive business value.&nbsp;</p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p><strong>What You’ll Be Doing (ie. Job Duties)</strong></p> <ul> <li>Develop and<strong> deploy robust causal inference models</strong> to quantify the holistic business impact of new product launches (e.g. PSM, Double ML)</li> <li>Act as a leader to establish <strong>standards for measurement</strong> for new product and feature launches&nbsp;</li> <li>Provide <strong>technical mentorship</strong> for other members of the data science organization&nbsp;</li> <li>Act as a <strong>thought partner</strong> for senior leadership to help guide our product development process&nbsp;</li> </ul> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p><strong>What We Look For In You:</strong></p> <ul> <li>PhD or Master’s degree in a quantitative field such as Economics, Statistics with 8+ years of distinguished industry experience</li> <li>Strong proficiency in SQL, Python, R, or other programming languages used for data analysis and statistical modeling</li> <li>Deep theoretical and applied expertise in a wide range of quasi-experimental methods&nbsp;</li> <li>A track record of influencing business and product strategy through data-driven, causal insights, and a proven ability to translate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.</li> <li>Demonstration of our core cultural values: clear communication, positive energy, continuous learning, and efficient execution.</li> </ul> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p><strong>Nice to Haves:</strong></p> <ul> <li>Experience in the fintech or crypto industries.</li> <li>Specific experience working pricing models, marketing attribution, or customer LTV modeling.</li> <li>Familiarity with the unique opportunities and challenges of crypto businesses and blockchain data.</li> </ul> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p><em>Disclaimer: Applying for a specific role does not guarantee consideration for that exact position. Leveling and team matching are assessed throughout the interview process.</em></p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p>ID: G2462</p> <p>#LI-Remote</p> <div id="fortidlp-input-element-parent"></div><div class="content-pay-transparency"><div class="pay-input"><div class="description"><span style="font-weight: 400;"><strong>Pay Transparency Notice:</strong> Depending on your work location, the target annual salary for this position can range as detailed below. Our Product Management team drives product initiatives from inception, roadmap prioritisation through to execution, makes impacts and launches products / features across our global footprint. You will be able to drive impact and launch products/features across our global footprint. You will collaborate closely with engineers, designers, analysts, marketers, and other cross-functional team members to ship remarkable features and products.

For example, data transformation, data modeling, and data quality tooling.&nbsp;</li> <li><strong>Self-serve analytics products: </strong>Deliver tailored data products, designed to empower users with self-serve capabilities and ensure accurate answers to their data inquiries.</li> </ol> <p><strong>What you’ll be doing (ie. job duties):</strong><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p> <p>Your primary responsibilities will include building tools and products that enhance data science productivity, enable self-serve analytics, and ensure data reliability and quality. This role deals specifically with blockchain data.&nbsp;</p> <p>More specifically:&nbsp;</p> <ul> <li><strong>Data modeling: </strong>Design data models that support our data scientists in leveraging blockchain data in their analysis.</li> <li><strong>Data transformation and tooling:</strong> Build tooling and pipelines for getting blockchain data from APIs, Files, and Databases into a clean and useful format.</li> <li><strong>Data quality tooling: </strong>Build mechanisms of data quality measurement and enforcement. Ensure reliability and completeness of data.</li> <li><strong>Scrappy &amp; creative problem solving:</strong> Get creative in applying blockchain knowledge to write heuristics and models that answer questions about what is happening on chain.</li> </ul> <ul> <li><strong>Cross-Functional collaboration: </strong>Work alongside fellow data engineers and cross-functional partners from Data Science, Data Platform, Machine Learning, and various analytics teams to ensure alignment on priorities and deliverables.&nbsp;</li> <li><strong>Self-serve analytics: </strong>Enable stakeholders to self-serve their own analytics by making blockchain data available and approachable.</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you (ie. job requirements):</strong></p> <ul> <li><strong>Blockchain data experience: </strong>You should know about blocks, transactions, token transfers, contract calls, account and UTXO models and labeling etc. Deep understanding of blockchains is a must. secure-by-default network patterns for developers.</li> <li>Write code for automations that support security requirements like threat detection, incident containment, and network access management.</li> <li>Partner with engineering teams to review network and routing architecture design changes.</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you (ie. job requirements):</strong></p> <ul> (OPA) or comparable policy-as-code solutions.</li> <li>Proven experience implementing AWS Network Firewall or GCP Cloud Firewall in large-scale production environments.</li> <li>Demonstrated expertise in managing Cloudflare.</li> <li>Experience with both GCP and/or on-premise infrastructure.</li> </ul> <p>Position ID: P72327</p> <p>#LI-Remote</p><div class="content-pay-transparency"><div jobs.title: Senior Python Developer - Exchange Middle and Back office
jobs.description:
The exchange team develops and maintain a cutting-edge trading platform. With a global presence across APAC, EMEA and North America, the team has since grown with the goal to provide a seamless and secure trading experience for our clients.

Our Middle and Back office team are focusing on designing and implementing systems for user management, fund management, risk management, data management, security, compliance features and reward, yielding features for user growth within our exchange platform. Responsibilities include ensuring seamless user experiences, fine-grained risk management, robust security measures, compliance with regulations, and optimizing user engagement.

You will help build the next generation of systems to make cryptocurrency accessible to everyone across the globe, operating real-time applications with high frequency, low latency updates, and managing the most secure infrastructure running in the cloud.</p> <p>The Growth organization drives Coinbase’s mission of bringing the world onchain. By building and leveraging growth tools across multiple avenues, including referral and incentives programs, creating a world-class notifications system, building a dynamic, engaging, and accessible logged-out web experience, and optimizing our new user onboarding flow, we ensure that Coinbase is the easiest, safest, and fastest way to buy, hold, and trade Crypto assets, and ensure our new users are set up for success from their first interaction.</p> <p>What you'll be doing:</p> <ul> <li>Architect and develop distributed systems</li> <li>Provide technical structure to teams and work closely with management and stakeholders to define strategic roadmaps</li> <li>Manage individual projects priorities, deadlines and deliverables with your technical expertise</li> <li>Mentor and train other team members on design techniques and coding standards</li> <li>Design and implement foundational infrastructure components used by every engineering team in production (e.g. notifications service, deferred deep-linking, SEO services, etc…)</li> <li>Write high quality, well tested code to meet the needs of your customers</li> </ul> <p>What we look for in you:</p> <ul> <li>You have at least 8+ years of experience in software engineering.</li> <li>You’ve experienced architecting and developing solutions to ambiguous problems with significant impact</li> <li>You’re passionate about building an open financial system that brings the world together.</li> </ul> <p>Nice to haves:</p> <ul> <li>You have experience launching new products from 0 to 1</li> <li>Experience with growth experiments or A/B testing frameworks.</li> <li>You have experience with Blockchain technology (such as Bitcoin, Ethereum etc..)</li> <li>You’ve worked with Golang, Ruby, Docker, Rails, Postgres, MongoDB or DynamoDB.</li> <li>You’ve built fintech, highly reliable and/or secure systems.</li> <li>Crypto-forward experience, including familiarity with onchain activity such as interacting with Ethereum addresses, using ENS, and engaging with dApps or blockchain-based services.</li> </ul> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Job #: GCBE06US</span></p> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">*Answers to jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>The <strong>Institutional Product Group</strong> enables the foundations of Coinbase's institutional business supporting thousands of large financial institutions. We enable institutions to custody their digital assets and participate in the crypto economy in a secure and safe way. We take pride in building a scalable &amp; secure crypto platform supporting hundreds of assets and enabling crypto participation with staking, governance and web3 gateways. The team has interesting work on building cutting-edge crypto technologies, scalable infrastructure and UI surfaces across web, mobile and browser extensions in a fast-paced industry with an opportunity to build several new initiatives.</p> <p>The <strong>Markets, Exchange team</strong> within the Institutional Product Group is dedicated to creating top-tier Exchange platforms, offering unparalleled low latency and high performance in the crypto trading space. As a Staff Software Engineer on the Markets team, you’ll be instrumental in developing and sustaining the core technology that drives our platforms. Collaborating with a talented group of engineers and product managers, you’ll deliver institutional-grade systems that empower high-value customers to trade with unmatched speed and efficiency. This role presents the opportunity to tackle complex, unique challenges, bridging the demands of large-scale applications with the precision required for low-latency trading systems. You'll be at the forefront of designing, building, and executing solutions for some of the most impactful and challenging problems in the industry.</p> <h4><strong>What you’ll be doing (ie. job duties):</strong></h4> <ul> <li>Architect and implement core trading platform components responsible for connectivity, market data, trade execution, clearing and settlement using Java, Golang and similar technologies</li> <li>Design scalable, low latency, garbage free systems to solve novel problems with modern cloud technology and industry best practices.</li> <li>Articulate a long term vision for maintaining and scaling our core trading systems and the teams running them.</li> <li>Work with engineers, product managers, designers, and senior leadership to turn our product and technical vision into a tangible roadmap every quarter.</li> <li>Write high quality, well tested code to meet the needs of your customers.</li> <li>Mentor team members and help uplift the technical bar across the team</li> </ul> <h4><strong>What we look for in you:</strong></h4> <ul> <li>8+ years of experience in backend software engineering using Java, Golang or similar languages</li> <li>You’ve designed, built, scaled and maintained high volume and low latency production services</li> <li>You’ve experience in architecting and developing solutions to ambiguous problems with significant impact</li> <li>Passion for building an open financial system that brings the world together</li> </ul> <h4><strong>Nice to haves:</strong></h4> <ul> <li>You have built order management, risk or matching engines that have high volume and low latency characteristics</li> <li>Demonstrated experience working with complex distributed systems at scale</li> <li&

jobs.title: Staff Software Engineer, Infrastructure - Datastores
jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. This monumental goal rests on a foundation of data, and the Datastores team is the architect and guardian of that foundation. We engineer the critical database infrastructure that powers every product, every transaction, and every user interaction on a global scale, making us the bedrock of the entire company.</p> <p>We are seeking a visionary Staff Software Engineer to join this pivotal team. This is not a role for the faint of heart. You will be entrusted with the keys to systems that handle millions of requests per second, supporting a diverse and rapidly evolving portfolio of technologies—from OLTP databases like MongoDB and Postgres to analytics powerhouses like ClickHouse and caching solutions like Redis. Your work will be the engine that ensures the reliability, scalability, and performance of the entire Coinbase ecosystem.</p> <p>In this role, you will be more than just an engineer; you will be a technical leader and a strategic partner to teams across the company. You will guide them in selecting the right database technologies for their needs, provide them with fully paved and automated solutions, and pioneer the industry-defining technologies that will meet the complex demands of Web3. If you are driven to solve problems at a massive scale and build the database infrastructure that will help increase economic freedom for the world, we want to hear from you.<br><br><strong>What you’ll be doing (ie. job duties):</strong></p> <ul> <li>Architect and pioneer the next generation of Coinbase’s distributed database technologies (e.g., MongoDB, Postgres, DynamoDB, ClickHouse, Redis), building and running highly available services that handle millions of requests per second.</li> <li>Drive the evolution of our core database systems, relentlessly pursuing improvements in scalability, reliability, performance, and cost efficiency to meet the demands of a global user base.</li> <li>Serve as a technical leader and force multiplier, guiding senior engineers and leadership on critical architectural decisions while anticipating the future needs of the business.</li> <li>Uphold the highest standards of operational excellence, delivering world-class, well-tested code for our customers and taking ownership of system reliability through proactive maintenance and expert-level troubleshooting during on-call rotations.</li> <li>Be a forward-thinking expert, researching and integrating cutting-edge industry trends and emerging technologies to continuously enhance our systems and define the future of datastores for Web3.</li> </ul> <p><strong>What we look for in you (ie. job requirements):</strong></p> <ul> <li>You have at least 8+ years of industry experience with a proven track record of building and operating scalable, fault-tolerant, and highly available distributed systems.</li> <li>You have deep, hands-on experience with incident response and disaster recovery for large-scale database deployments in a production environment.</li> <li>You have thrived in a high-growth environment, ideally experiencing the scaling challenges of a company growing from 10 to 100s of engineers.</li> <li>You have a solid understanding of distributed database architecture, performance t

You will provide timely coaching to team members based on their performance against quality &amp; productivity metrics. Additionally, you will work closely with Workforce Management to ensure scheduling optimization and adherence. This includes conducting in-depth analyses of any performance gaps among team members. You will become a subject matter expert in Coinbase's operational processes and workflows.&nbsp;</p> <p>To perform your duties successfully, you will utilize tools such as: Maestro QA, Salesforce, Slack, G-Suite, Confluence, Looker, Amazon Web Services (AWS), and proprietary technologies. Familiarity with these systems is essential for tracking agent performance, collaborating with colleagues, documenting procedures, and analyzing business data.</p> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">&nbsp;</span></p> <p><strong>What you’ll be doing (ie. job duties):</strong></p> <ul> <li>Lead a team of high performing 15 Payments Risk analysts&nbsp;</li> <li>​​Provide leadership and mentorship across key areas like performance management, learning &amp; development, and leadership skills</li> <li>Achieve SLAs, productivity and quality metrics for your line of business/team members</li> <li>Collaborate cross-functionally with Program, Quality and Training teams to improve existing workflows and processes.</li> <li>Manage and support initiatives aimed at preventing chargebacks, customer appeals and balanced enforcement measures</li> <li>Utilize an in-depth understanding of Payments Risk metrics to drive data-backed business decisions</li> <li>Ensure compliance with fraud detection guidelines and conduct regular audits</li> <li>Leverage data to identify product gaps and operational inefficiencies</li> <li>Continuously add value through effective project management, dedicated prioritization and efficient execution</li> </ul> <p><span style="font-weight: 400;">&nbsp;</span></p> <p><strong>What we look for in you (i.e. job requirements):</strong><strong><br></strong></p> <ul> <li>Customer obsessed, motivated by Coinbase’s mission and crafting a seamless support experience for our global customer base</li> <li>6+ years combating fraud in e-commerce or financial services&nbsp;</li> <li>BA/BS degree or equivalent practical experience</li> <li>Minimum of 3 years of people management experience in an operations environment</li> <li>Strong analytical skills and functional knowledge of common fraud patterns</li> <li>Excellent track record of leading deeply engaged and high performing teams and using metrics to make business decisions</li> <li>Ability to work independently and as part of a team, with a high level of self-motivation, personal accountability, and natural curiosity</li> <li>Exceptional organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and manage competing deadlines</li> <li>Dri

jobs.title: Technical Program Manager II
jobs.description: <div class="content-intro"><p>Ready to be pushed beyond what you think you’re capable of?</p> <p>At Coinbase, our mission is to increase economic freedom in the world. It’s a massive, ambitious opportunity that demands the best of us, every day, as we build the emerging onchain platform — and with it, the future global financial system.</p> <p>To achieve our mission, we’re seeking a very specific candidate. We want someone who is passionate about our mission and who believes in the power of crypto and blockchain technology to update the financial system. We want someone who is eager to leave their mark on the world, who relishes the pressure and privilege of working with high caliber colleagues, and who actively seeks feedback to keep leveling up. We want someone who will run towards, not away from, solving the company’s hardest problems.</p> <p>Our <a href="https://www.coinbase.com/mission">work culture</a> is intense and isn’t for everyone. But if you want to build the future alongside others who excel in their disciplines and expect the same from you, there’s no better place to be.</p> <p>While many roles at Coinbase are remote-first, we are not remote-only. In-person participation is required throughout the year. Team and company-wide offsites are held multiple times annually to foster collaboration, connection, and alignment. Attendance is expected and fully supported.</p></div><p>The Security team’s goal is to identify, measure, manage, mitigate, and report risk associated with products to keep our customer’s funds and data safe. As a Program Manager in the Security Programs team, you will work with the Security organization to build and drive meaningful business and security outcomes through complex XFN programs while empowering our engineering/product teams to act as owners of security risk. If you’re passionate about solving security problems at scale and want to join a fast-paced team helping to protect billions of dollars worth of digital assets and maintain our reputation, then we’d like to talk to you.</p> <p>The Security Programs team aims to be “cohesive tissue” for critical initiatives as a strategic partner with the Security team and broader business to drive security outcomes. We are tasked with maintaining an objective view of cross-functional initiatives, and helping leaders across the organization ensure resources are prioritized towards the right initiatives while ensuring that those initiatives ultimately mitigate risk. Our team is composed of Project Managers, Program Managers, and Technical Program Managers who work cross-functionally to maintain Coinbase’s “Most Trusted” brand by driving Security initiatives that protect Coinbase and our customers.</p> <p><strong>What you’ll be doing (ie. job duties):</strong></p> <ul> <li>Collaborating with program sponsors and cross-functional Security partners to document opportunities, challenges, and risks related to traditional and novel Security domains.&nbsp;</li> <li>Objectively assessing opportunities, challenges, and risks using qualitative and quantitative factors, including the identification of key risk indicators (KRIs) and performance indicators (KPIs) for program performance.</li> <li>Leveraging analysis to propose prioritization of scope, roadmap, deliverables, and budget for new initiatives with a focus on driving cross-functional initiatives that incrementally increase the state of program maturity over time.&nbsp;</li> <li>Working closely with program sponsors and cross-functional teams to influence adoption of critical initiatives on roadmap.&nbsp;</li> <li>Rapidly identifying and escalating risks to enable proactive collaboration and timely resolution.&nbsp;</li> <li>Providing program status to Security leadership while ensuring transparency on key metrics and program effectiveness</li> <li>Concurrently manage multiple critical projects including:&nbsp; <ul> <li>Establishing and updating milestones, risks, and timelines to facilitate cross functional collaboration.&nbsp;</li> <li>Managing the current state of various cross-functional workstreams as well as dependencies.&nbsp;</li> <li>Holding teams accountable for deliverable quality and completeness.&nbsp;</li> <li>Clearly assessing and communicating the impact of delays to the overall project timeline and security risks.</li> <li>Providing program status to Security leadership, ensuring transparency and collaboration.</li> <li>Conducting regular data analysis on security control performance to identify trends, anomalies, and areas for improvement.</li> <li>Driving process improvement initiatives within security programs, leverag

jobs.title: Senior UX Researcher
jobs.description:
Role Overview:

We’re seeking a Senior UX Researcher with 6–8 years of experience in complex product environments who wants to do more than just run studies—you want to transform how product decisions are made. This is your chance to embed research deeply in a fast-paced organization operating at the intersection of crypto and finance.

You’ll lead foundational and evaluative research while building a culture of continuous discovery across our flagship products: Main App, Exchange, and Onchain. You’ll introduce scalable frameworks, coach teams to own their research, and ensure user understanding is embedded throughout the product lifecycle. Your impact will extend beyond insights—you’ll shape strategy, accelerate learning cycles, and help measure how effectively we meet real user needs. If you want to build a research practice that drives what ships—and amplifies its impact through others—this is the role for you.

jobs.title: Software Developer - Early Career
jobs.description:
About Us
Founded in 2016, Crypto.com serves more than 150 million customers and is the world's fastest growing global cryptocurrency platform. Our vision is simple: Cryptocurrency in Every Wallet™. Built on a foundation of security, privacy, and compliance, Crypto.com is committed to accelerating the adoption of cryptocurrency through innovation and empowering the next generation of builders, creators, and entrepreneurs to develop a fairer and more equitable digital ecosystem. 

About the team
We are a team to design, develop, maintain, and improve software for various ventures projects, i.e., projects that are adjacent to our core businesses and are bootstrapped fast with a lean team. You will be actively involved in the design of various components behind scalable applications, from frontend UI to backend infrastructure.

jobs.title: VP of Marketing Intelligence
jobs.description: We are seeking a Head of Marketing Intelligence to lead our marketing measurement and analytics strategy. This role is designed for a proven operator who combines deep analytics and data science expertise with hands-on experience working closely with marketing teams to drive performance.  You will be responsible for building scalable attribution frameworks, advancing predictive and probabilistic models, and deploying AI-driven and automated solutions (including Generative AI) that unearth actionable insights to drive customer growth. This is a senior leadership role with high visibility and direct impact on company growth.

jobs.title: Web Experience Designer & Payload Developer (3 month contract)
jobs.description: As a Web Experience Designer & Payload Developer, you will play a key role in shaping and building the next generation of our content-driven web experiences. You will be responsible for designing reusable templates, implementing them within Payload CMS, and creating modular components and widgets that allow our teams to scale content production efficiently. This hybrid role combines design sensibility with hands-on front-end development and CMS integration, ensuring our digital properties are both visually engaging and technically robust.
